General.Name: Belvoir Group PLC
General.Description: Belvoir Group PLC operates as a property franchise company in the United Kingdom. It operates thorough two segments, Property Franchise and Financial Services. The company engages in selling, supporting, and training residential property franchises, as well as residential letting and sale activities. It also operates a network of financial services advisers to provide advice to residential property clients. The company was formerly known as Belvoir Lettings plc and changed its name to Belvoir Group PLC in July 2019. Belvoir Group PLC was founded in 1995 and is based in Grantham, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: The Old Courthouse, Grantham, United Kingdom, NG31 6HR
